make an extra p turn rs s1 k until 1 st before the gap ssk do not make an extra k turn repeat these last 2 row until there are no sts left to decrease there will be 20 sts on the needle gusset place the bor marker before the last knit st of the heel flap place another marker after the first st of the heel flap there will be 18 sts between the markers you will make the decreases for the gusset directly outside these markers the bamboo shoots between the markers at the middle of the sole will be 2 sts wide instead of 4 sts r1 pick up 15 17 19 sts along the side of the heel flap this can best be done from the backside of the heel flap with color a k the picked up sts in such a way that the sts look like twisted sts to prevent a hole pick up 1 st and ktb in the gap between the heel flap and instep cut color a bamboo bush socks v2 @ysselin 2024 continue in the color pattern of the leg for the next 32 36 40 sts of the instep pick up 1 st in the gap between the instep and heel flap and pick up 15 17 19 sts along the side of the heel flap knit these sts while continuing the color pattern of the leg until the m sm at this point we change from 4 sts wide bamboo shoots to 2 sts wide bamboo shoots for the centre of the sole color pattern of the 18 sole stitches last part of the round k2 with color c k2 with color b * 4 times in total k2 with color c slip the bor marker r2 the color pattern on this side of the sole is mirrored with the already knitted part before the marker for size s k1 with color c k4 with color b k4 with color c * until instep for size m k3 with color c k4 with color b k4 with color c * until instep for size l k1 with color b k4 with color c k4 with color b k4 with color c * until instep the color pattern should not be disrupted and should match the previous section knit in color pattern until marker sm knit in color pattern of the sole until bor sm r3 ssk knit in color pattern until 2 sts before m k2tog sm knit in color pattern of the sole until
